PerfectNetExp.abs: helle 黑勒, helleborine 嚏根草, hellebore 嚏根草属
hellebore 嚏根草属, helleborine 头蕊兰属, helleborine 嚏根草
helleborine (L.) Crantz and E.helleborine和疏花火烧兰E 。

list.abs: ... . . .素（protoanemonin） ，原阿片碱（protopine）。根含嚏根草碱（veratrin） ，嚏根草毒素（helleborin）。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: French or Latin, from Greek helleborinē, a plant like hellebore, from helleboros 'hellebore'

means.word_mean: 1. any of several small temperate and tropical orchids having mottled or striped leaves and spikes of small yellowish-white flowers in a twisted raceme
2. any of various orchids of the genus Epipactis
3. any of several orchids of the genus Cephalanthera
